flawed_nl_solution:
The students need eat 200 vegetables in total because 200 / 2 = <<200/2=1000>>1000
Each student needs to eat on average 1000 vegetables because 1000 / 25 = <<1000/25=40>>40
Each student needs to eat 40 vegetables per school week because 40 / 2 = <<40/2=20>>20
#### 20

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
